metaTags.metaDescription: SASE merges network and security services into a unified architecture. With Cloudflare, companies can secure and streamline network access from the cloud edge.

promotionalBanner.desktopText: Join Cloudflare experts live as we demo the latest in Zero Trust innovation and discuss how to leverage Cloudflare on your Zero Trust journey.

relatedBlades.title: Implement secure access service edge
relatedBlades.subtitle: Cloudflare secures and streamlines your network
relatedBlades.copy:
As enterprises migrate applications and data to the cloud, managing a network perimeter becomes more costly and complicated.

SASE simplifies network infrastructure by merging networking and security services into a unified architecture, delivered on the cloud edge.

relatedBlades.title: Redefining network infrastructure
relatedBlades.copy:
The old model of network infrastructure — centralized corporate data centers secured by an on-premise network perimeter — doesn't work for today's modern enterprises. Data that used to live in data centers now lives in the cloud and SaaS applications.

With the rise of distributed workforces, users need to be able to connect to resources from anywhere in the world, challenging enterprises to provide network access and a secure, straight-line path to the Internet without adopting complex workarounds or increasing latency.

imageAssetFile.altText: Hub and spoke network model: connection through central data center
imageAssetFile.title: SASE - Hub and spoke network model

relatedBlades.copy:
Secure access service edge (SASE) implementation simplifies traditional network architecture by merging network and security services on one global network. Instead of bottlenecking all traffic and users through a single, on-premise access point, SASE allows enterprises to route, inspect, and secure traffic in a single pass at the Internet edge.

Cloudflare is built on cloud-native infrastructure that we refer to as our global network. Our globally-distributed edge locations create a network fabric that brings security and performance capabilities as close to end users as possible, helping enterprises reduce latency, mitigate attacks close to the source, and seamlessly apply security controls to user connections.

relatedBlades.title: Network security at the edge
relatedBlades.copy:
SASE consolidates and delivers network security services — cloud access security brokers (CASB), secure web gateways (SWG), Firewall-as-a-Service (FWaaS), and more — from a unified and large-scale cloud network.

Instead of patching together disparate security services from multiple vendors, enterprises can adopt a single SASE architecture to help streamline complex and costly configurations and gain more visibility and control across their entire network infrastructure.

imageAssetFile.altText: Teams access zero trust spot illustration
imageAssetFile.title: Teams access zero trust spot illustration

relatedBlades.title: Identity-based network access
relatedBlades.copy:
Outdated infrastructure models required enterprises to secure the network perimeter with clunky, on-premise hardware. VPNs granted access to users outside the network perimeter, but often increased latency and expanded security vulnerabilities.

SASE moves network access from the network perimeter to the user. Access is determined by a granular, Zero Trust, policy-based model that verifies based on user identity and additional contextual factors.

imageAssetFile.altText: Teams access improvement plan spot illustration
imageAssetFile.title: Teams access improvement plan spot illustration

relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare is uniquely architected to deliver integrated network and security services across each of our %{DataCenterCount}+ locations worldwide, eliminating the need for enterprises to run traffic through a centralized data center or manage multiple point solutions in the cloud.
relatedBlades.title: How Cloudflare delivers SASE

features.title: Cloudflare Access
features.description: Our Zero Trust access solution enables enterprises to securely access internal applications and data by verifying requests and enforcing policies at our network edge, no matter where users are located in the world.

features.title: Cloudflare Gateway
features.description: Our web filtering and network security service protects users and corporate data by inspecting user traffic, filtering and blocking malicious content, identifying compromised devices, and using browser isolation technology to prevent malicious code from executing on user devices.

features.title: Magic WAN
features.description: Magic WAN replaces legacy WAN architectures with Cloudflare's network, providing global connectivity, cloud-based security, performance, and control through one simple user interface.

features.title: Succeeding with SASE - Whitepaper
features.description: Download this white paper to learn what Secure Access Service Edge (SASE) is, how it secures your network, and how Cloudflare delivers SASE with Cloudflare One.

features.title: Analyst report: Availability and buying options in the emerging SASE market
features.description: This in-depth research report from Enterprise Management Associates (EMA) reviews packaging, pricing, and security capabilities of nine SASE vendors, including Cloudflare.

features.title: 6 Considerations for Your SASE Setup
features.description: Secure Access Service Edge (SASE) adoption may seem intimidating, but it doesn't have to be. Read this infographic to learn 6 initial steps you can take.
